system.description:
A ¾ inch cube of bone, ivory, or stone. Pressing a face activates a 10’ cubic field of protection around the character.

  • Inside the field: A pleasant ambient temperature is maintained even if external conditions are much colder.

  • Cold-based attacks: Are absorbed by the field. If more than 50 hit points of damage are absorbed in the space of 1 turn, the field collapses and cannot be reactivated for 1 hour.
